title: Interior from Cuevas' Comedies
medium: Lithograph from a portfolio of ten lithographs (one with screenprint and embossing, one with embossing) and five screenprints (two double-sided, one with collage additions)
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 22 5/16 x 29 15/16" (56.6 x 76 cm); sheet (slightly irreg.): 22 13/16 x 29 15/16" (57.9 x 76 cm)
